body:
If this is the wrong email address, you can change it here and send your application again.

### What happens next

The LAA will consider your appeal and aim to email you with a decision within 2 working days.

If you do not hear back by then, contact [iojappeals@legalaid.gsi.gov.uk](mailto:iojappeals@legalaid.gsi.gov.uk).

[What did you think of this service?](/feedback) (takes 30 seconds)
heading: Application complete
lede: Weâ€™ll send your application to the Legal Aid Agency (LAA) and a copy to [email].
